name: MotoBike
description:
So. You are probably wondering what "MotoBike" is. Well, it's a brand-new-infinite-runner game where you are a guy on a motorcycle. Cool? Well, sadly this is only available on computers, such as Mac or Windows. No mobile support yet. Sorry mobile users lol. But this is a free-to-play game, meaning it's 100% free to play. No ads.

Watch the trailer here:
